From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Okay guys, I've just found out I am going away for at least four days.
It could be longer. rAuq and Gunther can take any characters Yan allows
them, although I hope not to much happens. (I really enjoy playing
Beachcomber, Firedrill, and the newly arrived Autobots, Decepticons).
I'm sorry if this will screw them game up at all, but dammit I'm gonna
have fun.
